panels.title: Mean Error Metrics Metal vs VM

targets.expr:
abs(
        rate(kepler_process_core_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='dynamic', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval]) 
        - on() 
        rate(kepler_node_core_joules_total{job='vm', mode='dynamic'}[$__rate_interval])
    ) 
    / on() 
    rate(kepler_process_core_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='dynamic', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval])

abs(
        rate(kepler_process_dram_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='dynamic', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval]) 
        - on() 
        rate(kepler_node_dram_joules_total{job='vm', mode='dynamic'}[$__rate_interval])
    ) 
    / on() 
    rate(kepler_process_dram_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='dynamic', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval])

abs(
        rate(kepler_process_package_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='dynamic', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval]) 
        - on() 
        rate(kepler_node_package_joules_total{job='vm', mode='dynamic'}[$__rate_interval])
    ) 
    / on() 
    rate(kepler_process_package_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='dynamic', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval])

abs(
        rate(kepler_process_platform_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='dynamic', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval]) 
        - on() 
        rate(kepler_node_platform_joules_total{job='vm', mode='dynamic'}[$__rate_interval])
        ) 
    / on() 
    rate(kepler_process_platform_joules_total{pid='${process}', mode='dynamic', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval])
